scripts.copy: mkdir -p build/vendors && cp -r src/*.html src/conf src/img LICENSE README.md build && ./build-vendors.js
scripts.copy-jsorolla: mkdir -p build/jsorolla && cd lib/jsorolla && npm run dist && cd ../.. && cp -r lib/jsorolla/dist build/jsorolla
scripts.vulcanize: node_modules/vulcanize/bin/vulcanize build/iva-app.html > build/iva-app-vulcanize.html && mv build/iva-app-vulcanize.html build/iva-app.html
scripts.build-iva-app: sed -i 's/..\/node_modules/vendors/' build/index.html build/iva-app.html && sed -i 's/..\/lib\/jsorolla/jsorolla/' build/index.html && sed -i 's/..\/lib\/jsorolla\/src/jsorolla\/dist\/js/' build/iva-app.html && npm run vulcanize && sed -i 's/\[\[importPath\]\]images/img/' build/iva-app.html
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run copy-jsorolla && sed 's/\.\.\///' src/prod/index.html > build/index.html && npm run build-iva-app
